column4: does anyone know a program to capture videos from a video camera, i have an old camera that use tape instead but it can do s-video out, is there a program in ubuntu that can caputer video in that tape and record it to the hardrive?
does anyone know of such program?

does anyone know a program to capture videos from a video camera, i have an old camera that use tape instead but it can do s-video out, is there a program in ubuntu that can caputer video in that tape and record it to the hardrive?
if you can play it you can use mplayer to capture it
